::Destron Base::

    The base played the message for Shredder.
    "Good, =
Shredder, I am glad to see that you have returned to us," The holo image of=
 Magmatron said. "If you are hearing this message I am no longer on the pla=
net. I hand over to you leadership of the Destrons. It would be best if you=
 linked with the ships itself. She will help you, remember that always. You=
 will find a copy of my plans in the computer files, but they can only be a=
ccessed if you have merged with the ship.
    "But what do my plans for thi=
s planet mean anymore? If I have left the planet then Unicron gave me Cyber=
tron, on a silver platter.
    "If CyberShark, Bobertron, or Pantron should=
 return, well send Bobertron to the Gateway, same for Pantron, as for that =
backstabbing CyberShark, well destroy him."
    The image faded. The comput=
er sat in wait for Shredder to bond with it.
  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, Aug=
ust 31, 2000 6:27 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW RPG



       My Groups | nbwrpg Ma=
in Page | Start a new group!  


  ::Shredder::

  Shredder recieves the ba=
se's message, walking off toward the command room. He 
  enters, looking ar=
ound.
